name: Terminate: Study X
description:
Terminate: Project X is a horror first-person shooter inspired by dystopian, violent and
grimdark themes.

FEATURES
  • Two difficulties, Hard and Nightmare
  • 6 Unique maps
  • Several types of special infected
  • Objectives

    In the game the player is sent as an artificial intelligence robot to the recently
    closed genetic engineering facility known as New Sapiens. After the COO of the
    facility, Dr. Feller, announced that a new disease took over their genetically
    enhanced human specimens, nasty rumors spread in the media. Majority of the
    population were against experiments with humans to begin with. New Sapiens
    took it a step further by carrying out research with newborn babies, which granted
    the homo sapiens species the best properties of all animals combined: high IQ of
    human, speed of cheetah, strength of gorilla, jump of spider… the hijacked list
    continued.
